column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I needed a book to read with a young relative of mine and decided to borrow it from the library rather than buy it .
#text=The local library is only a few blocks away to I walked there .
#text=I am familiar with the computers and the process for looking up to see if a book is available and where it is located on the shelf .
#text=The computer lookup station was available and quickly I was given the location of the book .
#text=The book was located in the proper location on the shelf .
#text=I selected the book and went to the counter to check it out .
#text=There were a few people in line ahead of me , but the wait was short .
#text=After scanning my library card and then the book the librarian asked if I needed a plastic bag to keep the book dry as it had started raining .
#text=I declined the offer of the bag as I had a waterproof backpack .
